# 1998 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1998 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1999 for the 1998 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1998 are as follows.
